short_summary: Amendment to closing time:', all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 23, 2023 by 2:00 PM EST. A rehabilitation program of a former landfill located at 40 Mile Creek.
description: Rehabilitation of a former landfill, establishing a self-sustaining vegetation cover of a historical landfill located at 40 Mile Creek in Banff National Park Alberta. Work includes site preparation, import and placement of topsoil, installation of vegetation (plants and native seed) and erosion/sediment control features, installation of a wildlife fence for plant protection and establishment of installed vegetation/plant materials.
full_summary:
EW699-240115 40 Mile Creek Landfill Restoration #
==============================

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** WS4013293715-Doc4013627812

**Amended Tender Information:**

*   The closing time for tender submissions has been updated to **June 23, 2023, 2:00 PM EST**. Submissions received after this date and time will be deemed non-responsive.
*   The Government of Canada has tasked the Public Services and Procurement Canada with rehabilitating a former landfill located at 40 Mile Creek in Banff National Park, Alberta.
*   The project objective is to establish a self-sustaining vegetation cover on the approximately 12,500 square meter (1.25 hectare) landfill area.

**Tender Overview:**

*   **Scope of Work:**
    *   Site preparation
    *   Import and placement of topsoil
    *   Installation of vegetation (plants and native seeds) and erosion/sediment control features
    *   Installation of a wildlife fence for plant protection
    *   Subsequent maintenance for the establishment of installed vegetation/plant materials
*   **Relevant Contracting Parties:**
    *   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    *   End User: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
*   **Notice Type and Procurement Method:**
    *   Request for Proposal
    *   Competitive - Open Tendering
*   **Trade Agreements:**
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity and Delivery:**
    *   Alberta, Canada

**Contact Information:**
 Danielle Graham (Public Services and
